{"id":905344107,"question_id":72,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1677419473,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/905344107/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n\n    int solve(int pos1,int pos2,string word1,string word2)\n    {\n        if(pos1 < 0)\n            return pos2 + 1;\n        if(pos2 < 0)\n            return pos1 + 1;\n        if(word1[pos1] != word2[pos2] )\n        {\n            return min( {solve(pos1-1,pos2-1,word1,word2),\n                        solve(pos1,pos2-1,word1,word2),\n                        solve(pos1-1,pos2,word1,word2) } ) + 1;\n        }\n        else\n        {\n           return solve(pos1-1,pos2-1,word1,word2);\n        }\n\n    }\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        return solve(word1.size()-1,word2.size()-1,word1,word2);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
